data.eml:eml: New earthworm records from Turkey, with description of three new species (Oligochaeta: Lumbricidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Szederjesi, Tímea, Pavlíček, Tomás, Coşkun, Yüksel, Csuzdi, Csaba (2014): New earthworm records from Turkey, with description of three new species (Oligochaeta: Lumbricidae). Zootaxa 3764 (5): 555-570, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3764.5.4
